author: lveldere
body:
this pr replaces #9855 
- BaseTrackerRecHit
  BaseTrackerRecHit::initialise qualWord_ in all constructors
- SiTrackerGS*RecHit
  - preparation for arbitrary hit combinations in fast tracking emulation
  - Note: these containers are FastSim-only
- FastSimulation/EgammaElectronAlgos/
  - removed outdated obsolete modules
- TrajectorySeedProducer & TrackCandidateProducer 
  - next step towards arbitrary hit combinations
- SiTrackerGaussianSmearingRecHitConverter
  - adapt to updated recHitContainer
- Miscelaneous
  - several other classes needed to be migrated to the updated recHitConainer
title: new rechit containers
